name: Salomon Launch Boa Junior Snowboard Boots - Youths
description: These freestyle boots have a medium flex designed to perform in all terrain types, with a top-quality, extra-warm thermomoldable liner for optimal comfort and control. BOA® lacing system lets you make precise, effortless fit adjustments, while an innovative heel harness locks down your heel for total edge-to-edge control.Versatile medium flex for all-conditions riding.Thermomoldable liner is machine washable.Cat-Tongue material at base of heel grips your socks for increased heel hold.BOA® lacing system allows precise, effortless fit adjustments.STR8JKT liner lacing locks your heel down with a comfortable heel harness.Cushioning Ortholite footbed wicks moisture for a drier, more comfortable fit.EVA midsole provides rebound and comfort.Grippy rubber outsole is low profile for comfortable riding and walking.
